column4: hi there. does anyone have dual soundcards in their desktops? Gutsy is randomly choosing which card to use on bootup.
I got quad SPUs (don't ask why). you can select them with system->admin->sound & multimedia
i do select which crad that way. It is *always* set to my M-Audio card. However, on boot, ubuntu randomly chooses between that and my onboard sound.
weird, I suggest you ask in the forums
